Name: Tank Mechanic Simulator VR
About the game: MORE GREAT GAMES: / / Fix, build and renovate highly detailed and fully interactive tanks (German, USA or Soviet), armored cars or self-propelled guns. Experience a realistic simulator game of being a Tank Mechanic. Grow your repair service business and start your own tank museum. Start the engine of a newly renovated tank, and feel its former power! Tank Mechanic Simulator in VR is a new experience Renovate II World War tanks. Transform them from rusty and ruined to fully working: De-rust the tank Sandblast the tank Apply primer paint to the tank Apply final paint to the tank (factory paint) Add custom paint, camouflage, color, decal in the paint room Sell the tank or put it in your museum to gain money and reputation Take tanks fully apart by using different tools: Rust Removal Tool Sand Blaster Paint Gun Hammer Grinder - to cut and grind Wrench pistol - to quickly disassemble rusted screws/bolts And yes... drive a tank in virtual reality on the training ground! Create and manage your museum Change the way your garage looks like ... and more üõ†Ô∏è Supported VR goggles/headsets: HTC Cosmos HTC Cosmos Elite HTC Vive HTC Vive Pro Microsoft Mixed Reality (VR, not AR) Oculus Quest (link) Oculus Quest 2 (link) Oculus Rift Oculus Rift S Hp Reverb g2 Valve Index many more want to know more?
